item.title: Copy Unblocker - A Userscript to Remove Website Copy Restrictions
item.description: A userscript that removes copy restrictions from various websites. This article details the installation process of Copy Unblocker, its main features, and how to extend support for more websites. No programming knowledge required - enable free copying of web content in just a few simple steps.
